attributes.action: Commission a Full Review of BBC Funding with a view to making it fairer to the Electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present it is obligatory to pay for a TV license if one has a connected Television set.  The license fee going to the BBC.

This is the case whether or not the license holder watches BBC Channels or not.

However, anyone with a computer, mobile phone, "iPod", etc. can download BBC programmes without paying for a license.  In fact the BBC produces some programmes, and a great deal of Internet content, that are available for download at no charge and which are unobtainable to license paying TV viewers.

rejection.details: There are a number of existing petitions surrounding this issue i.e http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BBCFunding/. Please use the search facility at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
